longInfo:
Admission and Transit Restrictions:
- Admission and transit refused to nationals of Armenia.

Additional Information:
- Normal non-biometric passports issued to nationals of
  Armenia must contain an endorsement stating the validity of
  the passport for stays abroad
vaccination:
Vaccinations not required.

Recommended:
- Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, exclusively due to P.
  vivax, from June to October in lowland areas. There is no
  malaria transmission in Baku. Recommended prevention in risk
  areas: A.
